other_title: ポケットモンスター　アドバンスジェネレーション
opening_theme: #01: "Advance Adventure" (アドバンス・アドベンチャー) by GARDEN (eps 1-69)
#02: "Challenger!!" (チャレンジャー！！) by Rica Matsumoto (eps 70-104)
#03: "Pokémon Symphonic Medley" (ポケモン シンフォニック メドレー) by Hirokazu Tanaka and Kazumi Mitome (eps 105-134)
#04: "Battle Frontier" (バトルフロンティア) by Akina Takaya (eps 135-165)
ending_theme: #02: "Polka O Dolka" by Inuko Inuyama and Norusoru Gasshoudan (eps 19-44)
#04: "Ippai Summer" by Naomi Onmura and the Himawari Choir
#07: "I Won't Lose! Haruka's Theme" by KAORI (eps 173-192)
